results.title: Simvastatin down-regulates osteogenic response in cultured human aortic valve interstitial cells.
results.text_hl: These data offer mechanistic insight into a possible therapeutic role for @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@aortic stenosis@@@.

results.title: Association of Annual N-Terminal Pro-Brain Natriuretic Peptide Measurements With Clinical Events in Patients With Asymptomatic Nonsevere Aortic Stenosis: A Post Hoc Substudy of the SEAS Trial.
results.text_hl: DESIGN, SETTING, AND PARTICIPANTS: Analysis of annual NT-proBNP concentrations in the multicenter, double-blind @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ezetimibe@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@Aortic Stenosis@@@ (SEAS) randomized clinical trial was performed.

results.title: Effect of simvastatin and ezetimibe on suPAR levels and outcomes.
results.text_hl: METHODS: We investigated whether treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ 40 mg and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ezetimibe@@@ 10 mg lowered plasma suPAR levels in 1838 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with mild-moderate, asymptomatic @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@aortic stenosis@@@, included in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@Ezetimibe@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@Aortic Stenosis@@@ (SEAS) study, using a pattern mixture model.

results.title: Ezetimibe plus simvastatin cardiovascular outcomes study program.
results.text_hl: Four major outcome trials are underway to study the effect of @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in different subsets of high-risk @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@: familiar @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Valve_Stenosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001024 @@@degenerative aortic stenosis@@@, @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic kidney disease@@@ and @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@acute coronary syndrome@@@.
